website_summaries.verdict: A classic whisk broom that is practical for virtually any messes you need to sweep away.
pros: A sturdy whisk broom by a top brand in home products
Made of corn fiber, which is natural and durable enough for both indoor and outdoor use
Mid-range size is suitable for small and large cleanups
Topped with a tough metal ring for storing
cons: Bristles occasionally break off or fall out
Some owners wish it were angled instead of straight-edged
Does not come with a dustpan like others on our list

customer_reviews.title: Terrible value!
customer_reviews.text: The brush I ordered was made in the USA (printed on the head) and is an awesome design that is simple and effective. Great value for money and I am ordering a few more because they are so good! Update 6.18.16 I received two new brushes yesterday and they have changed the product - it is smaller and has less bristles...not anywhere near the previous quality and I will be returning them both
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: All my grandpa wanted for Christmas was a "whisk broom"
customer_reviews.text: My grandpa is 90 years old and all he wanted for Christmas was a whisk broom, so that's what he got. It's a broom, it whisks. He likes using it to clean off his shoes and such when he comes in from gardening (yes, he still does this, guess that's how he's 90!) Perfect for what it is. Still holding strong (the broom and my grandpa).
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Another misrepresented item.
customer_reviews.text: This review is based on the description and not necessarily the quality of the item. This was advertised as a "2-pack" and as "Made in the USA". Only one was shipped, and the packaging indicates it is made in Mexico. I make purchase desicions based upon the descrption. It is annoying when many items are falsely represented. This is not worth the time, packaging, etc. to return.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Does a Good Job
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look as of the broom is angled. It isn't. It's cut straight across, but still does a good job. These are really hard to find in a big city for some reason. Couldn't find at grocery, WalMart, or Home Depot, if you can believe that. I should have just gone straight to Amazon instead of running all over town. I keep it outside on my bench swing to sweep off leaves and other debris before sitting down. It's stiff enough to make short work of stuff that's dried on and sticking to the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Vandermey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent useful brush MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used a natural fiber whisk brush in many years. Forgot how effective they are and have a good textured feel to them. Very effective brushing small leaves on swings and outdoor sitting areas. They are well made and should last a long time with moderate usage. Like it so much I bought another one for outdoors. They are holding up well with regular use on my outdoor seating area. They have a pleasant natural scent and are a good alternative to the plastic trap many of us find ourselves in. Nice price point. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter DP

customer_reviews.title: NOT made in USA as the description states.
customer_reviews.text: Good brisk broom. 4 stars because description states made in USA. IT IS FACT MADE IN MEXICO. Another successful bait and switch by Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: toni taylor

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dustpan for use when cleaning up in the yard. It has worked OK, but because it is plastic and so large the edge has become warped and is no longer straight across making it difficult to sweep everything into the pan. I have to put my foot on it to prevent grass and leaves from going underneath. Its annoying and I wouldn't have purchased it if I had know the edge would have gotten so uneven.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIEDOLL

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking or but local!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - I pick up numerous strands of straw as it is not well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Don SC

customer_reviews.title: A dust pan you can't sweep dust into
customer_reviews.text: The blade at the front is bowed upward in the middle making it useless. This part should be reinforced to stay perfectly straight and the addition of a rubber blade would make this the perfect dust pan for doing maximum work!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Grey

customer_reviews.title: They don't make these like they used to...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who needs his car to be spotless. Not to the point of obsessive, but I really don't want my floor mats covered with stuff. I've always kept a whisk broom in my car. Hidden away, under a seat or in the trunk, to be pulled out as needed. And after a quick sweep my car would feel like new again. This broom, however, makes a bigger mess than the one I'm trying to clean. The bristles started coming out immediately. I thought the other reviewers were overstating it, but if anything, they didn't warn people enough. Save your money and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Make another choice
customer_reviews.text: I like the size very much. It holds a lot of swept up items. BUT as one other reviewer noted, I had the same experience with it bowing up at the end. So if you have fine matter to get up, it ends up going up under the pan. I use mine to get up grass clippings on the street curb and grit, etc. on my garage floor. I have to make several passes to get most of the fine matter due to the thin, bowed up edge . The end needs to be thicker and sturdier to work well. I suggest making another choice.
customer_reviews.author: spyder

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in picture. Find a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK product and worth what I paid. However, only a 3 star rating for the following. What was received was not as shown in the ad picture! The corn bristles are about 1/2 count of what was shown in the picture. The bristles are much larger in diameter and much fewer. Some of the bristles have 'split ends' not sure if that will effect use and result of cleaning. Finally if what I received was shown as the product picture I would have bought something different. I would not recommend this to others. Sorry rubbermaid, the quality is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: tnek

customer_reviews.title: Just Bad
customer_reviews.text: So it's not like this was an expensive purchase or anything and maybe I shouldn't have expected more, but this whisk is of surprisingly poor quality. There were a bunch of bent, broken and loose fibers. In addition to that, the ends of the whisk are all ragged and frankly look insect chewed.
customer_reviews.author: TGJ

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with nail sticking out the crooked top and small sharp wire poking out around the head of that nail. Not sure how durable this will be as it has a lot of the thin weak bristles and only 40% or so of the thick sturdy ones that my old one was made up of.
customer_reviews.author: jmamk

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Whisk Broom
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these brooms--both look used. Very weak whisks...some are already not attached and falling out, some are broken and not attached, so falling off, some are bent....these are higher up towards handle where they should be well attached to the metal. One arrived with the plastic off--which again, made me think upon opening it, it was used & returned and reshipped to me haphazardly. I would not buy these again. They will do light work and you will spend time cleaning up what falls out--I have seen better made ones and will purchase a nice, strong, sturdy one elsewhere or a different make. These are just too weak, fragile, w/loose pieces. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like Rubbermaid once was
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product. I respect it as an in-house dust pan, but it is NOT heavy duty and doesn't compare to its predecessor (thicker, harder plastic). I'm immediately uncomfortable with the flimsiness of the handle. I am hopeless to find the original Rubbermaid heavy duty, black dustpan which lasted me many years before
customer_reviews.author: steven alcorn

customer_reviews.title: It is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Alright, I have to admit I missed the part where it is a 22 inch dustpan and was rather shocked, you could land a plane on this thing. It is well designed, very light weight for the size, and I suspect it is going to last for quite a while. I dinged it one star because for one of the uses I have, it is almost too big. All in all though, good product and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great. When you have a heavy load in it you can feel the handle begin to buckle. I could see this cracking or breaking eventually with heavy loads or in cold temps. The front does have a substantial 'lip'. I assume purpose being to prevent dust / debris from falling out. You really just need to tip these back a bit to prevent that, the lip does nothing helpful imo. It just annoys me and makes it difficult at times to dump out the dust / debris. I would prefer it not be there. Having said all that, its a dustpan and it gets a simple job done.
customer_reviews.author: MooseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Old school whisk still the best.
customer_reviews.text: Old school whisk brooms are hard to find in stores. Happy to find one at Amazon. Synthetic bristle brooms really can't compete with corn brooms, and whisk corn brooms are something you'll find many uses for. They tuck anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Rodeo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Handle
customer_reviews.text: Not very wide at all, actual brushes width is 1.5" the worst part of the brush is the handle, absolute torture to use it more than a minute or so, it it cut into your hand due to the ridges. Actual brushes themselves are fine, pretty soft and sweeps up debris like it's supposed to, the handle definately needs to be redesigned, preferable made round and even rubber added to the handle for better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Shoot2Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as a2 pack You will receive 1 broom!
customer_reviews.text: IF ORDERING THIS, BEWARE! IT ADVERTISED TWO IN PACK. NOT SO. YOU WILL RECEIVE ONE (1) BROOM IN PACK!! Rubbermaid Commercial Corn Fiber Whisk Brush, 12-Inch, Yellow, FG9B5500YEL (2 Pack) YOU GET A (1PACK)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The bristles are relatively fine and soft. They easily sweep fine dust particles. For the price, this is a good buy. My only complaint would be that the bristles fall out rather quickly. I’ve only used it a couple times but have seen a few bristles fallen out already. Given that it’s reasonably priced, I’d still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality brush
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photos, this is a Rubbermaid product. The body of the brush is made from a plastic material. The curved handle is five inches long. The brush area is seven inches long. The bristles are 2.75 inches long and made of a Nylon material. The nice thing is they are fethered at the end to make a soft tip. There are five rows of bristles. to make a solid brushing area. I purchased this brush for my work bench. It does a good job of clean up. The brush is made in China. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WA8UOC

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primarily because the description says " Made in the USA". This is a outright lie. When I received the brush it clearly says right on the label that it's made in China. I will keep one of the two I bought because they are decent brushes, but I really don't like being lied to. The brush itself works fine and looks like it will last for a while. If I didn't care where it was made though I would have had other choices. Still deciding if I'm going to send one back.
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: NOT made in USA, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If I had known what this was going to be like I never would have ordered it. First, despite the description, this is NOT made in the USA...and it shows. It's just poorly and cheaply made. Yes, it'll work, more or less. It's *nothing* like the quality of these things when I was a boy. This one is worth about $2.99, imo. If you want a GOOD one, keep looking. If you want an adequate one, this'll work, I guess, but it's no pleasure. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gannet

customer_reviews.title: Great dustpan for dirt and picking up leaves
customer_reviews.text: I love this dustpan. I have back problems so I just place this dustpan on the floor and sweep into it as needed. I can then move it with my feet to make sure I get up all the dirt. This replaces another large dustpan that ended up with a broken handle. This handle seems to be much more sturdy. This dustpan is large enough to help with picking up leaves - I just rake in the leaves and hold with the rake to get into the leaf receptacle. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The brush itself is ok. It's a brush, nothing special, but nothing particularly disappointing. The bristles could be a bit more flexible. My main gripe is that amazon states that it is made in the USA, which is why I bought this instead of one of the others. It is however, made in China.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Wow, a giant dustpan!
customer_reviews.text: This dustpan is way larger than anyone would need for ordinary home clean up. However, if you have a big house with multiple German Shepherd Dogs, or a shop where you work on projects, or need to do a big job, this is just the thing! Like another reviewer said - if you need something this big for your kitchen, you are not sweeping often enough, lol. It is massive. But if that is what you need, this is the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a less-stiff plastic... near rubbery stuff seems to work well I think. Some crumbs still sneak under it because it is very firm. BUT I am happy with it because all the ones at the store were cheap flimsy ones, and my 5 kids always seem to break those in a few weeks/days. Not being one to let the kids grow up lazy and ignorant of chores, we now have a very sturdy one. No more excuses, kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: F. Feickert

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a corn whisk broom with this one and it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our dog ate our friends corn whisk broom and therefore we needed to replace her broom. I found it, ordered it and it was delivered the next day and our friends don't know that we even replaced there broom. Yay! Win, Win for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: SMBella

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Please pay attention and not just look at the picture and think it’s close to normal size dust pans because they make this dust pan look as if it’s the same size as as your normal dust pan but it’s actually the size of 2 dust pans put together. I just don’t understand how they don’t have not one picture of this dust pan being shown correctly. I didn’t want no big ass dust pan like this.
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly bigger dustpan than I thought I was getting, but glad of it! I use it for cleaning the chicken coop. I was using a little house type one and made a zillion trips to the garden with their poo. Now I hold this dustpan in my left hand and a scraper in the right and this dustpan holds probably twenty times more poo. Makes my job way more efficient. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie NelsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't sit well in your hand
customer_reviews.text: The Rubbermaid name convinced me to buy this brush, the quality IS good. HOWEVER, the ergonomics of the brush sitting in the hand during use are TERRIBLE. TOTALLY uncomfortable holding the brush for use. This is mainly due to the deep indentations on both sides of the handle, you really feel the hard plastic edges on your hand, not to mention that there are finger grips in the handle that won't fit everyone's hand. Sorry Rubbermade, a total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Description clearly says "2 Pack" but...
customer_reviews.text: Description of this item says "Rubbermaid Commercial Corn Fiber Whisk Brush, 12-Inch, Yellow, FG9B5500YEL (2 Pack)". I received a single whisk broom. Contacted Amazon and they are taking care of it. And, the description says "Made in USA". while the packaging says "Made in Mexico". So...beware if that matters to you. Hopefully these mistakes or misleading descriptors will be changed.
customer_reviews.author: FacePlant

customer_reviews.title: Not a good broom
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold up long...after 2 weeks of daily use sweeping out a dump truck and there are loose straws everywhere
customer_reviews.author: MrsHague

customer_reviews.title: Great little wisk broom
customer_reviews.text: Good hand broom for cleaning ash from my fire pit. I should have paid better attention to the product description, because the broom is a little bit longer/taller than I expected. It's also a hard/strong corn fiber broom, you don't have to worry about this broom not sweeping up anything. It would be perfect for umpires cleaning Home Plate, although the length would make it difficult to keep in a pocket. All told, I'm satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kapt Krunch

customer_reviews.title: Clean Sweep
customer_reviews.text: First impression of the Rubbermaid Commercial 8 Inch Counter Brush is it seems well made. The flagged polypropylene bristles definitely have a softer feel which should translate into finer particles being swept up. Long term testing not available.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Millworks, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: For our family, this is THE best little whisk broom
customer_reviews.text: We keep one in each major house area, as well as in the vehicle for keeping the carpets in order. They stand up to a lot of work, and they truly get the hairs and lint and such out of small area rugs that a vacuum can't handle. They hardly take up any room, and are easy to use because they are also light. We won't use any other little brush.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo, indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I got a large push broom to sweep my deck and basement. I decided I needed a large dustpan for the broom, and purchased this one. Boy is it JUMBO! My first thought on unpacking it was "this is a shovel," but really it's exactly what I need. It's sturdy but lightweight and almost the same with as the push broom. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: In dustpans, size does matter!
customer_reviews.text: The broom I bought is about 2 inches wider than the delicate consumer-grade dustpans I had around the house. This commercial-grade dustpan is truly enormous if your standard of measurement is your mom’s dustpan. It is much more efficient than the old-style swish and cut way you have to use a home-version dustpan. It’s much faster to use this dustpan. The whole oversized broom fits past the mouth of this behemoth, so the process requires only one placement of the dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Halton

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Well made brush for the price. It works very well with my new industrial dust pan. I like the artificial bristles as they maintain their stiffness better than natural bristles. Bristles are feathered on the tips to pick up finer particles.
customer_reviews.author: Rational

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: These used to be Made in the USA and were great brushes. The newest one I bought from Amazon is clearly marked Made in China and is of inferior quality. Way to go Rubbermaid! I'd rather pay more for a quality brush.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Adams

customer_reviews.title: Could however  be better
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this product. It works great in the garage. However it could be made a little stronger, Shortly after the return period expired I noticed this item had warped. It does not sit flat on my floor ant more. Still works but sometimes you have to do a couple of passes to make sure you get everything,
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: American made?  Not so fast Uncle Sam.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely made corn whisk broom, with a sturdy double stitched seam and nicely wound wire cap. I ordered this because I wanted a whisk broom that was made in the USA. When I received it the "Made In" sticker revealed that it was actually made in Mexico. Bummer. Still a great workshop tool, but the vendor needs to check and edit their product description.
customer_reviews.author: Warthog49

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find and well worth the money. This whisk broom is very well made and a nice item if keep in your car. My husband has one under the seat in both of our Rav4s and they have come in very handy to sweep away dirt from the cargo area and floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo dustpan is truly jumbo - check the measurements before ordering
customer_reviews.text: This thing is truly JUMBO. If I had checked the measurements I probably would not have ordered it. It arrived in what I thought was a ridiculously large box - but I was the silly one for not checking measurements first. But now i have used it outdoors and love it. Made in USA stamped on it.
customer_reviews.author: Go Big Bob

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm old enough to remember when a whisk broom lasted for years, and not old enough to have forgotten. I get it, it's just a whisk broom, and I'm very appreciative that they are still being made... somewhere. This one just OK. shedding its broom straw regularly. So be it
customer_reviews.author: silvertone

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used once and realized the leading edge is wavy. You can't pick up dust with a wavy edge which makes it worthless. Some dust pans you can overcome this with increased down pressure but due to the design of this one, that does not correct the problem. Very disappointed with a Rubbermaid brand item. My other construction dust pan by libman is outstanding and has held up to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo Heavy Duty Black - Dust Pay --- great size, but a bit not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for two years, mostly for leafs on the street and street dirt/grime. It's nice, love the size (Jumbo Heavy Duty). It's bottom floor lip has warped a bit and it feels a bit flimsy - like can only hold about six or eight pounds of weight. I like it, it's not a home run, but good.
customer_reviews.author: iworkblue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Counter Brush
customer_reviews.text: This item is made for commercial environments. However, it's very useful for home use. The handle is solid and sturdy. The bristles feel like a soft tooth brush. Ignore the reviews that gave this item only one star -- most of them were regarding it not made in USA. For me, the country of origin is meaningless because the item is extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was repainting an old bookcase with a faux woodgrain effect, and instead of spending a bunch of money on a flogging brush, I decided to try one of these. I couldn't find one locally in the store, so ordered here. It arrived quickly and let me accomplish the painting effect I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gourd Lady

customer_reviews.title: Consider metal
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the wide lip of this item, which should lie flat on the ground, bowed up in the middle, leaving a gap that allows sweeping to go under the pa and not into it. At this over-size, the rubber-plastic doesn't have the strength to keep it's intended shape. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: heart and soul

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality brush
customer_reviews.text: High quality brush. I wanted the brush to clean my woodworking tools from fine dust and the brush works perfectly. Another step to having a clean workshop (garage). Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Pancho

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Softer material than the old Rubbermaid model we had, which allows for better pick up of debris. Even good for (indirectly) using a blower to get yard debris from under shrubs as the back of the pan is high enough to catch it all. Holds a lot & handy to be able to attach to the broom handle.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: wisk broom
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted wasn't in package Tuesday don't know what happen one corner of the package was open enough maybe the broom fell out or when I called Amazon the said some drivers have been known to take what's in the package but got the brook yesterday and it is great
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hawks

customer_reviews.title: This is bigger tan I pictured, really my fault ...
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger tan I pictured, really my fault. It work well and it was the next size up form the 12 inch size which was too small. So it is OK but really big.
customer_reviews.author: CherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is just a little too large and unwieldy for my liking. It is definitely good quality and I was able to use it to clean out all the ash from my fire pit so I am keeping it. But I think if I could do it over, I would go down to a smaller and lighter option.
customer_reviews.author: Kim First

customer_reviews.title: Best lawn and leaf scoop I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a landscaper and this thing is big. You can scoop up huge amount of leaves and debris with it and it's tough and durable. This is my third one in about 12 years. They last.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Close but just not
customer_reviews.text: Impulse good deal purchase. It's big, handle locks onto brooms. However it is essentially hard plastic not very flex forgiving. Looks like it will do the trick but feels like if dropped and hits right would break, especially if left outside then used in winter cold. Hopefully it survives as long as the previous other.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo-size works great.. never going back to regular-size dustpan for outdoor work
customer_reviews.text: I can sweep a garage or driveway and pick up a lot of leaves/dirt at a time instead of many trips to the trash can. Was worried because a different review said something about the edge not being straight but it works fine for me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Middle of rim warped after couple of uses. No longer flush to surfaces being swept! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Steele

customer_reviews.title: Strong and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Strong brush. I bought it mainly for dirty yard work. And especially to clean out my lawn mower after every use. Wet grass builds up quick, but this broom helped me clean it out easily. It is very lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: Xin V Chi

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but not cheaply priced.
customer_reviews.text: They don’t make these like they used to! Bristles are stiff and spread apart so it’s not very effective as a whisk broom. Good ones are hard to find so keep your eye out for an old used on. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Meaney

customer_reviews.title: Half as thick as they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I remember these from when I was a kid. We used them to sweep out our cars. I bought two to do just that. These are about half as thick as they used to be so I hope they work as well as the used to. I have my doubts.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Great dustpan. I've owned it for almost 4 years now and has never broke or cracked. Great material. Another great item from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: extras large dustpan
customer_reviews.text: The material it is made from is too breakable. Needs to also be heavier, more flexible. I bought one online a few yrs. ago & it was perfect-this is a cheapy version. Too bad!! Bring back the good quality Rubbermaid!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Useful and quality product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for brushing the leaves off the patio cushions. Seems to be well made and I expect to get a few years out of it. Used it quite a few times already and haven't had any shedding. Best to keep this inside and not let it get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo dustpan
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor dustpan, I use it all the time for outdoor cleaning, this is my second one and I was delighted to be able to replace it because you can't usually find it in any stores. Great for saving time and effort when cleaning big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Falls after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the broom to do some slight sweeping in car, so that I did not have to use the vacuum as often. The bristle started coming out as soon as I started using it. I would go for another brand which is more tightly bound together.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't a very heavy duty commercial item that lives up to the Rubbermaid name.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old whisk broom that was made back when I was a kid. I'm 64. It wasn't used much and I needed another for upstairs use. This can't compare to the old one in terms of the number of bristles/density of them etc. It's a classic example of something that copies the old concept but cuts corners in the making of it. Hey! Charge a few bucks more for it, but make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but not your father's
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product and a good value. I recommend it. That said, it is not as good as the ones made fifty years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find this little corn broom. Easy to use, sturdy, bristles don't fall out. Love it! Have bought two of these we find them so handy will even clean the floor mats in our car.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: A learning curve but I am glad I did learn.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sweeping off furniture to remove crumbs, doggie hair, as well as a dinner table, window inside, tie a cloth around the bristles and perfect for cleaning for the ceiling fans. I would have never thought to even use one of these but my neighbor is Twain and she has taught me a lot on how to use these handy little brooms.
customer_reviews.author: ReB

customer_reviews.title: Response from my wife:
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, packaging was in good condition, the product was in good condition and appeared to be as described, and after use met expectations for fit, form, and function.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: One Big Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! I knew what I was ordering, but I guess it never registered until it was delivered. Works great for sweeping up the stuff in the garage & driveway. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IS GOING ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: MY HAND BROOM LOOK LIKED A CHILD PUT IT TOGETHER AND IM JUST SPEECHLESS
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: For the Ute or trailer
customer_reviews.text: I got this to sweep away mess from the back of the Ute tray. Green waste, dirt, sand whatever really. Great little brush, very sturdy and small enough to be hidden or hung away out of site but placed in a handy position in the vehicle. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: I love it better then my other one cause it doesn't have the rubber edge. Can't or just don't want to live without my big dust pans. Five stars and some thank you
customer_reviews.author: jjardine

customer_reviews.title: great broom
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a good whisk broom to brush the fir needles if my gutter screens. Big box stores don't carry them any more. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: michelle heitzman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.text: It's description said 2 were included. It's not true. "Rubbermaid Commercial Corn Fiber Whisk Brush, 12-Inch, Yellow, FG9B5500YEL (2 Pack)" I hate being mislead like this. Only received 1. When customer service reordered only received 1.
customer_reviews.author: Badgermac

customer_reviews.title: Giant!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge dustpan. Even after reading the dimensions, i was surprised at the visual when it arrived. It's wider than a rake if you're using it outside and deep also. It's very sturdy also. My one and only - very minor - peeve is that i wish the handle were able to clip to the broomstick.
customer_reviews.author: Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Good Small Task Broom
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom. Ordered online because couldnt find one of real straw in our location. Works well for small tasks. Designis good and "bristles" are tight.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Raisins

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Dustpan
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Which makes it awesome for sweeping up messes. I have three children so I have a lot of messes. I’m probably a little more attached to this dustpan than is normal. Don’t care, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice brush.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is really good. The tips of the bristles are really soft and clean up everything.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeezy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it look like it is an angle cut at the bottom, which would be nice. But it is still a good product- very heavy duty and well made
customer_reviews.author: Kaye T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for leaves and weeds in garden
customer_reviews.text: This is so helpful scooping up weeds and leaves around my yard. It is sturdy and made in USA which is great. The only complaint I have is the edge sometimes doesn’t lay fly against concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Erin ellis

customer_reviews.title: As Good As A Whisk Broom Should Be.  A+++++
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, solid built product. The broom does a great job with good quality at a bargain price... couldn't ask for any better than that. - Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.author: K. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Little sweep ups
customer_reviews.text: This whisk broom will serve its purpose for us. We still cannot find a small broom or larger that is made as well as what we have had in the past. Perhaps straw is harder to come by.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the hard to clean areas like behind the washing machine and dryer. The bristles are strong enough to get the dirt up an thin enough to fit in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without It!!!
customer_reviews.text: When my Father in Law's extra large dust pan threw in the towel I was so excited to find a replacement here on Amazon and I couldn't beat the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: That's a monster of a pan
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a pan for yard work getting up pine needles in large quantities (PNW). WOW! what a dustpan. Exactly what I wanted. HUGE and sturdy, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S. Grant

customer_reviews.title: ALL GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if there was something coming off of the bottom back , below the handle that you could step on to hold it in place while sweeping debris in to it.
customer_reviews.author: WEB

customer_reviews.title: Good Thick Constructed Broom
customer_reviews.text: This broom is nice for what I use it for. I clean up after guinea pigs in their cages and this broom holds together and does a fine job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandpoint

customer_reviews.title: bristle density and stiffness seem optimum
customer_reviews.text: What can I say... feels durable, brushes well, bristles seem thick but soft at the ends, not too stiff. I use it to clean off my kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was sick and tired of grabbing small amounts of leaves...
customer_reviews.text: I was sick and tired of grabbing small amounts of leaves and putting them in the garbage can! I saw this jumbo dust pan and thought it couldn't be any worse and it could improve my outdoor cleaning time. Wow, I don't know how I survived without this. The amount of time I saved by not having to bend over or try and pick up leaves between two rakes (which inevitably would mostly fall back onto the ground) is crazy. I am so glad I bought this. The jumbo size makes yard work so much more enjoyable...or at least less of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dustpan.
customer_reviews.text: Great dust pan for the outdoors. I’ve been using it to pickup leaves along with a rake and it works great. I’ve left it outdoors in the rain and sun for the last couple months and it hasn’t gotten brittle or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Tried & True!! Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Just what i needed. After trying all the fancy car vacs i went back to the tried & true!! I needed something that worked at sweeping up the car & this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This is what a hand broom should be!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this broom/brush makes clean up so easy. No more sweeping the same small area 5 times to get ALL the dirt and crumbs. No more chasing the little left over dirt pile trying to get all of it onto the dustpan. I knew the flimsy little $5.99 hand broom and dustpan sets that you can buy at the market were bad, but I didn't realize how bad until I bought this broom and the Rubbermaid dust pan. Sweep once, push onto dustpan once, done! Defnitely going to buy a few more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Min Clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Whiskbroom Should
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for the size and material, replacing a similar one that was more than a decade old. I'm pleased with this one after 6 months occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to keep in my truck. Works better that a plastic one. For some reason these are hard to find in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: cfmiii

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial 12 Inch Corn Whisk Broom, Yellow (FG9B5500YEL)
product_meta.description: Style:Corn Broom| Configuration:BrushRubbermaid Commercial FG9B5500YEL Corn Fiber Whisk Broom, Yellow. Use indoors or outdoors to remove heavy dirt and debris from floors, porches, decks, driveways, sidewalks, and other outdoor surfaces. Two rows of stitching make the broom more durable than typical brooms with fewer stitches. Use indoors or outdoors to remove heavy dirt and debris from floors, porches, decks, driveways, sidewalks, and other outdoor surfaces. A metal ring on the end of the handle allows the broom to be hung for storage. Measures approximately 12 1/4-inch length. Made in the USA
feature_bullets: The broom has corn fiber bristles and a shorter handle than standard brooms.
Two rows of stitching make the broom more durable than typical brooms with fewer stitches.
Use indoors or outdoors to remove heavy dirt and debris from floors, porches, decks, driveways, sidewalks, and other outdoor surfaces.
A metal ring on the end of the handle allows the broom to be hung for storage.
Measures approximately 12 1/4-inch length. Made in the USA.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
